text: KRGU-LP (97.7 FM) is a low-power FM radio station licensed to Midwest City, Oklahoma, United States. The station is currently owned by Midwest City Knights Of Columbus Building Corporation ==History== The station call sign KRGU-LP on April 27, 2016. ==References== ==External links== * http://www.okcr.org * RGU-LP RGU-LP Category:Religious radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in Oklahoma RGU-LP
title: KRGU-LP
